'''Lómin''' is a [[Mithrimin]] word meaning "of echoes".<ref name="PE">{{PE|17}} p.133</ref>
==Examples==
*[[Dor-Lómin]]
*[[Ered Lómin]]
==Cognates==
*[[Sindarin]] ''[[loven]],<ref name="PE"/> [[glamren]]''
==Other version==
The word was formerly mentioned to be [[Doriathrin]],<ref>{{LR|Etymologies}}, entry LAM</ref> a variant of ''lómen''
